author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ghazal maestro Ghulam Ali will perform in Kolkata on January 12.

The event would be held at Park Circus Maidan and the singer would be accompanied by his son, Trinamool Congress national spokesperson Derek O’ Brien said.

Last year when a controversy broke out after the Shiv Sena forced the organisers to cancel the concert of the singer in Mumbai, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee was among the first to extend an invitation to Ghulam Ali.

“We will ensure that the programme turns out to be a grand success,” Trinamool Congress MP Sultan Ahmed told The Hindu .
title: Ghulam Ali to perform in Kolkata on Jan. 12
